snippet: Max Clifford, known for advising pop stars, was the fifth person to be arrested in an inquiry set up in the wake of allegations of widespread sexual abuse by Jimmy Savile.
abstract: Max Clifford, multimillionaire star publicist, is arrested in London by police officers investigating sexual offenses; Clifford is fifth person to be arrested in inquiry set up in wake of allegations of sexual abuse by BBC host Jimmy Savile.
lead_paragraph: Max Clifford, known for advising pop stars, was the fifth person to be arrested in an inquiry set up in the wake of allegations of widespread sexual abuse by Jimmy Savile.

headline.seo: Publicist Max Clifford Questioned in Sex Case in London
headline.main: Star Publicist in Britain Is Questioned in Sex Case
headline.print_headline: Star Publicist In Britain Is Questioned In Sex Case
